title: Lifelong Learning Orientation Assessment and Development Process

context.prior_knowledge: Entry-level learning experience in medical/educational fields
context.additional_context: Targets in-service professionals, conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments. Requires learning designs linked to project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose and improve their beliefs about lifelong learning using a 4-point Likert scale.
Learners can systematically assess their ability to identify learning opportunities in work environments.
Learners can self-evaluate their information literacy skills and propose strategies for improvement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
